about.title: Professional Logistics
about.description: As SeaLive, we are leaders in the global freight forwarding sector with FCL and LCL container shipping, multimodal transport solutions, and comprehensive customs clearance services.

feature1.title: Global Network
feature1.description: We provide seamless freight forwarding operations with our worldwide network of shipping lines and logistics partners.

feature2.title: Expert Team
feature2.description: With our experienced freight forwarders team, we professionally manage your Bill of Lading, MAWB, and TIR documentation processes.

feature3.title: Technology
feature3.description: We provide shipment visibility and operational efficiency with advanced tracking systems and digital freight management platforms.

services.title: Comprehensive Logistics
services.description: Professional freight forwarding services across all transportation modes with comprehensive supply chain management and customs clearance expertise.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Discover why companies trust Sealive Logistics for their global freight forwarding needs.

cards.name: Johnathan Smith
cards.text: Sealive Logistics transformed our supply chain. Their professionalism and efficiency are unmatched. Highly recommended for any complex shipping needs.

cards.name: Samantha Lee
cards.text: The team at Sealive Logistics is fantastic. They handle all our air freight with incredible attention to detail. True partners in our success.

cards.name: Carlos Rodriguez
cards.text: We ship perishable goods, and the reliability of Sealive Logistics is crucial for us. Their on-time delivery record is impeccable.

cards.name: Chen Wang
cards.text: For cross-continental freight, there's no one I trust more than Sealive Logistics. Their expertise in customs and documentation is a game-changer.

cards.name: Fatima Al-Jamil
cards.text: The customer service at Sealive Logistics is top-notch. They are always responsive, proactive, and provide clear updates on our shipments.

hero.title: Leading Yacht Transportation Specialists
hero.description: With over 15 years of experience in marine logistics, we specialize in secure, professional yacht transportation services for luxury vessels worldwide.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2009, SeaLive began as a specialized freight forwarding company with a vision to revolutionize yacht transportation services. What started as a small operation has grown into a globally recognized leader in marine logistics.
story.paragraph2: Our expertise in luxury vessel transportation has made us the preferred choice for yacht owners, brokers, and manufacturers worldwide. We understand that each yacht represents significant investment and emotional value to its owner.
story.paragraph3: Today, we operate through a network of specialized marine terminals across 50+ countries, ensuring your vessel receives the same level of professional care regardless of destination.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide every aspect of our yacht transportation services, ensuring excellence in every shipment.

security.title: Security & Insurance
security.description: Full coverage protection up to $50M with comprehensive marine insurance policies.

network.title: Global Network
network.description: Specialized marine terminals and logistics partners across 50+ countries worldwide.

handling.title: Expert Handling
handling.description: Dedicated yacht transport specialists with decades of marine logistics experience.

team.title: Professional Team
team.description: Certified marine transport professionals ensuring white-glove service standards.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.quote: To provide the world's most reliable and professional yacht transportation services, ensuring every luxury vessel reaches its destination safely, securely, and on time.
mission.description: We combine decades of marine logistics expertise with cutting-edge technology and an unwavering commitment to excellence, making us the trusted choice for yacht transportation worldwide.

cta.description: Contact our team of yacht transportation specialists for a personalized consultation and detailed quote for your vessel.

hero.title: Global Ocean
hero.description: Comprehensive ocean freight services connecting major ports worldwide with FCL, LCL, and project cargo solutions. Reliable, cost-effective, and fully tracked shipments.

servicesSection.title: Ocean Freight Services
servicesSection.description: Flexible ocean freight solutions tailored to your cargo requirements and budget.

services.title: FCL (Full Container Load)
services.description: Complete container shipping solutions for large cargo volumes with dedicated container space and competitive rates.

services.title: LCL (Less Container Load)
services.description: Cost-effective consolidation services for smaller shipments sharing container space with other cargo.

services.title: Break Bulk & Project Cargo
services.description: Specialized handling for oversized, heavy, or unconventional cargo requiring special equipment and expertise.

routesSection.title: Major Shipping Routes
routesSection.description: Regular services on major trade routes with competitive transit times and frequencies.

hero.title: Reliable Road
hero.description: Door-to-door land transport services across Europe, Asia, and Middle East corridors. TIR-certified operations with real-time tracking and customs clearance support.

servicesSection.title: Land Transport Services
servicesSection.description: Comprehensive road transport solutions for all cargo types and destinations.

services.title: Full Truck Load (FTL)
services.description: Dedicated truck services for large shipments requiring exclusive use of the entire trailer capacity.

services.title: Less Than Truck Load (LTL)
services.description: Cost-effective consolidation services for smaller shipments sharing truck space with other cargo.

services.title: Cross-Border Transport
services.description: International road transport with TIR and customs clearance services across European and Asian corridors.

routesSection.title: Major Transport Routes
